data.text: @VOCMNEWS Of course not. There are greater tragedies in the world.
@VOCMNEWS Couldn’t care less it’s the flu sick of hearing about ittt.

@Stace_Alexander @80ssummercamp @VOCMNEWS No. It is my responsibility to stay home if I am sick and wear masks when I am asked. You assume I am not responsible enough to make those decisions? Your fear is not my concern. My tweet was kind. Im sorry you are so stressed by others. Be well.
@VOCMNEWS Why in the world would anyone miss this? Because living in fear and misinformation the last two years wasn’t long enough?
@VOCMNEWS Nope dont give a flying fk
@VOCMNEWS Continuing to keep this pandering to the extremely cautious doesn't help anyone
@powerstangs @VOCMNEWS @FureyAndrew You have to give him a price to do that.

@Benney2488 @80ssummercamp @CaptainNFLD_ @PierreV62811380 @VOCMNEWS Agreed. And hopefully over the coming months and years, the harms that the singular obsession with one ailment can be addressed. Too late for many, though.
@VOCMNEWS I never really paid  any attention to the numbers  for almost 2 years so why start now.
